      • search

        public static SearchHandle search(String searchString,
                                  TaskCompleteCallback callback,
                                  org.ihtsdo.otf.query.lucene.LuceneDescriptionType descriptionType,
                                  UUID advancedDescriptionType,
                                  Integer targetCodeSystemPathNid,
                                  Integer memberOfRefsetNid,
                                  Integer kindOfNid)
                           throws IOException
        Launch a search in a background thread (returns immediately) handing back a handle to the search.
        Parameters:
        searchString - - the query string
        callback - - (optional) the class instance that desires a callback when the background threaded search completes
        descriptionType - - (optional) if provided, only searches within the specified description type
        advancedDescriptionType - - (optional) if provided, only searches within the specified advanced description type. When this parameter is provided, the descriptionType parameter is ignored.
        targetCodeSystemPathNid - - (optional) Restrict the results to concepts from the specified path.
        memberOfRefsetNid - - (optional) Restrict the results to concepts that are members of the specified refset.
        kindOfNid - - (optional) restrict the results to concepts that are a kind of the specified concept
        childOfNid - - (optional) restrict the results to concepts that are children of the specified concept
        Returns:
        - A handle to the running search.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • search

        public static SearchHandle search(int sourceConceptNid,
                                  TaskCompleteCallback callback,
                                  org.ihtsdo.otf.query.lucene.LuceneDescriptionType descriptionType,
                                  UUID advancedDescriptionType,
                                  Integer targetCodeSystemPathNid,
                                  Integer memberOfRefsetNid,
                                  Integer kindOfNid)
                           throws IOException
        Launch a search in a background thread (returns immediately) handing back a handle to the search.
        Parameters:
        sourceConceptNid - - the source concept of the map - the descriptions of this concept will be used to create a search
        callback - - (optional) the class instance that desires a callback when the background threaded search completes
        descriptionType - - (optional) if provided, only searches within the specified description type
        advancedDescriptionType - - (optional) if provided, only searches within the specified advanced description type. When this parameter is provided, the descriptionType parameter is ignored.
        targetCodeSystemPathNid - - (optional) Restrict the results to concepts from the specified path.
        memberOfRefsetNid - - (optional) Restrict the results to concepts that are members of the specified refset.
        childOfNid - - (optional) restrict the results to concepts that are children of the specified concept
        Returns:
        - A handle to the running search.
        Throws:
        IOException

        Throws:
